original_title: 切り裂きレ●プ ハサミ男に狙われたフィアンセ 紗々原ゆり
overview: Yuri has been waiting for her boyfriend to propose for a while. And when the moment finally arrives, she is almost in tears.  However, happiness doesn’t last long as a janitor also has an interest in her, a dude skilled with scissors that won’t bother to propose.
title: Fiancée Yuri Sasahara Targeted By A Scissors Man
